articles.description: South Africa's Cyril Ramaphosa wins leadership of governing ANC, despite corruption allegations.
articles.content:
South Africa's scandal-hit President Cyril Ramaphosa has been re-elected the governing ANC's leader to wild cheers from his supporters. 
He defeated his rival Zweli Mkhize by 2,476 votes to 1,897.
